objectStorageBaseUrlDesc:
The URL used as reference. Specify the URL of your CDN or Proxy if you are using either.
For S3 use 'https://<bucket>.s3.amazonaws.com' and for GCS or equivalent services use 'https://storage.googleapis.com/<bucket>', etc.
objectStorageBucketDesc: Please specify the bucket name used at your provider.
objectStoragePrefixDesc: Files will be stored under directories with this prefix.
objectStorageEndpointDesc: Leave this empty if you are using AWS S3, otherwise specify the endpoint as '<host>' or '<host>:<port>', depending on the service you are using.
objectStorageRegionDesc: Specify a region like 'xx-east-1'. If your service does not distinguish between regions, leave this blank or enter 'us-east-1'.
objectStorageUseSSLDesc: Turn this off if you are not going to use HTTPS for API connections
objectStorageUseProxyDesc: Turn this off if you are not going to use a Proxy for API connections
showFixedPostForm: Zobrazit formulÃ¡Å™ pro novÃ© pÅ™Ã­spÄ›vky nad Äasovou osou

deleteAllFilesConfirm: Jste si jistÃ­ Å¾e chcete smazat vÅ¡echny soubory?
removeAllFollowingDescription: Executing this unfollows all accounts from {host}. Please run this if the instance e.g. no longer exists.
yourAccountSuspendedDescription: This account has been suspended due to breaking the server's terms of services or similar. Contact the administrator if you would like to know a more detailed reason. Please do not create a new account.
serviceworkerInfo: Must be enabled for push notifications.
author: Autor
leaveConfirm: There are unsaved changes. Do you want to discard them?
pluginTokenRequestedDescription: This plugin will be able to use the permissions set here.
useStarForReactionFallback: Use â˜… as fallback if the reaction emoji is unknown
emailConfigInfo: Used to confirm your email during sign-up or if you forget your password
emptyToDisableSmtpAuth: Leave username and password empty to disable SMTP verification
smtpSecure: Use implicit SSL/TLS for SMTP connections
notificationSettingDesc: Select the types of notification to display.
useGlobalSettingDesc: If turned on, your account's notification settings will be used. If turned off, individual configurations can be made.
regenerateLoginTokenDescription: Regenerates the token used internally during login. Normally this action is not necessary. If regenerated, all devices will be logged out.
fillAbuseReportDescription: Please fill in details regarding this report. If it is about a specific note, please include its URL.
abuseReported: Your report has been sent. Thank you very much.
forwardReportIsAnonymous: Instead of your account, an anonymous system account will be displayed as reporter at the remote instance.
editTheseSettingsMayBreakAccount: Editing these settings may damage your account.
i18nInfo: Misskey is being translated into various languages by volunteers. You can help at {link}.
noCrawleDescription: Ask search engines to not index your profile page, notes, Pages, etc.
lockedAccountInfo: Unless you set your note visiblity to "Followers only", your notes will be visible to anyone, even if you require followers to be manually approved.
loadRawImages: Load original images instead of showing thumbnails
verificationEmailSent: A verification email has been sent. Please follow the included link to complete verification.
makeExplorableDescription: If you turn this off, your account will not show up in the "Explore" section.
showGapBetweenNotesInTimeline: Show a gap between posts on the timeline
reloadToApplySetting: This setting will only apply after a page reload. Reload now?
needReloadToApply: A reload is required for this to be reflected.
sendErrorReportsDescription:
When turned on, detailed error information will be shared with Misskey when a problem occurs, helping to improve the quality of Misskey.
This will include information such the version of your OS, what browser you're using, your activity in Misskey, etc.
youAreRunningUpToDateClient: You are using the newest version of your client.
newVersionOfClientAvailable: There is a newer version of your client available.
userPagePinTip: You can display notes here by selecting "Pin to profile" from the menu of individual notes.
notSpecifiedMentionWarning: This note contains mentions of users not included as recipients
hideOnlineStatusDescription: SkrytÃ­ vaÅ¡eho online stavu mÅ¯Å¾e snÃ­Å¾it funkcionalitu nÄ›kterÃ½ch funkcÃ­, napÅ™Ã­klad vyhledÃ¡vÃ¡nÃ­.
customCssWarn: This setting should only be used if you know what it does. Entering improper values may cause the client to stop functioning normally.
useBlurEffect: Use blur effects in the UI
accountDeletionInProgress: Account deletion is currently in progress
usernameInfo: A name that identifies your account from others on this server.  You can use the alphabet (a~z, A~Z), digits (0~9) or underscores (_). Usernames cannot be changed later.
makeReactionsPublicDescription: This will make the list of all your past reactions publicly visible.
ffVisibilityDescription: Allows you to configure who can see who you follow and who follows you.
deleteAccountConfirm: This will irreversibly delete your account. Proceed?
leaveGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave "{name}"?
useDrawerReactionPickerForMobile: Display reaction picker as drawer on mobile

_accountDelete.sendEmail: Once account deletion has been completed, an email will be sent to the email address registered to this account.

_aboutMisskey.about: Misskey is open-source software being developed by syuilo since 2014.
_aboutMisskey.morePatrons: We also appreciate the support of many other helpers not listed here. Thank you! ğŸ¥°

_wordMute.muteWordsDescription: Separate with spaces for an AND condition or with line breaks for an OR condition.
_wordMute.muteWordsDescription2: Surround keywords with slashes to use regular expressions.
_wordMute.softDescription: Hide notes that fulfil the set conditions from the timeline.
_wordMute.hardDescription: Prevents notes fulfilling the set conditions from being added to the timeline. In addition, these notes will not be added to the timeline even if the conditions are changed.

_instanceMute.instanceMuteDescription: This will mute any notes/renotes from the listed instances, including those of users replying to a user from a muted instance.
_instanceMute.title: Hides notes from listed instances.
_instanceMute.heading: List of instances to be muted

_theme.invalid: The format of this theme is invalid
_theme.inputConstantName: Enter a name for this constant
_theme.importInfo: If you enter theme code here, you can import it to the theme editor
_theme.deleteConstantConfirm: Do you really want to delete the constant {const}?

_tutorial.title: How to use Misskey
_tutorial.step1_2: This page is called the "timeline". It shows chronologically ordered "notes" of people who you "follow".
_tutorial.step1_3: Your timeline is currently empty, since you have not posted any notes or followed anyone yet.
_tutorial.step2_1: Let's finish setting up your profile before writing a note or following anyone.
_tutorial.step2_2: Providing some information about who you are will make it easier for others to tell if they want to see your notes or follow you.
_tutorial.step3_2: Then let's try posting a note next. You can do so by pressing the button with a pencil icon on the screen.
_tutorial.step3_3: Fill in the modal and press the button on the top right to post.
_tutorial.step3_4: Have nothing to say? Try "just setting up my msky"!
_tutorial.step4_2: Hurray! Now your first note should be displayed on your timeline.
_tutorial.step5_1: Now, let's try making your timeline more lively by following other people.
_tutorial.step5_2: {featured} will show you popular notes in this instance. {explore} will let you find popular users. Try finding people you'd like to follow there!
_tutorial.step5_3: To follow other users, click on their icon and press the "Follow" button on their profile.
_tutorial.step5_4: If the other user has a lock icon next to their name, it may take some time for that user to manually approve your follow request.
_tutorial.step6_1: You should be able to see other users' notes on your timeline now.
_tutorial.step6_2: You can also put "reactions" on other people's notes to quickly respond to them.
_tutorial.step6_3: To attach a "reaction", press the "+" mark on another user's note and choose an emoji you'd like to react with.
_tutorial.step7_1: Congratulations! You have now finished Misskey's basic tutorial.
_tutorial.step7_2: If you would like to learn more about Misskey, try the {help} section.
_tutorial.step7_3: Now then, have fun with Misskey! ğŸš€
_tutorial.step8_1: Lastly, would you like to enable push notifications?
_tutorial.step8_2: Enabling these will allow you to receive notifications for mentions, reactions, follows, etc. even when Misskey is not opened.
_tutorial.step8_3: You can always change this setting later.

_2fa.alreadyRegistered: You have already registered a 2-factor authentication device.
_2fa.step1: First, install an authentication app (such as {a} or {b}) on your device.
_2fa.step2: Then, scan the QR code displayed on this screen.
_2fa.step3: Enter the token provided by your app to finish setup.
_2fa.step4: From now on, any future login attempts will ask for such a login token.
_2fa.securityKeyInfo: Besides fingerprint or PIN authentication, you can also setup authentication via hardware security keys that support FIDO2 to further secure your account.
_2fa.step2Url: You can also enter this URL if you're using a desktop program:

activeEmailValidationDescription: Enables stricter validation of email addresses, which includes checking for disposable addresses and by whether it can actually be communicated with. When unchecked, only the format of the email is validated.

_role.name: Role name
_role.descriptionOfPermission: Moderators can perform basic moderation operations. Administrators can change all settings of the instance.
_role.descriptionOfAssignTarget: Manual to manually change who is part of this role and who is not. Conditional to have users be automatically assigned and removed from this role based on a condition.
_role.descriptionOfIsPublic: Anyone will be able to view a list of users assigned to this role. In addition, this role will be displayed in the profiles of assigned users.
_role.descriptionOfAsBadge: This role's icon will be displayed next to the username of users with this role if turned on.
_role.canEditMembersByModerator: Allow moderators to edit the list of members for this role
_role.descriptionOfCanEditMembersByModerator: When turned on, moderators as well as administrators will be able to assign and unassign users to this role. When turned off, only administrators will be able to assign users.

_options.wordMuteMax: Maximum number of characters allowed in word mutes
_options.noteEachClipsMax: Maximum number of notes within a clip
_options.userEachUserListsMax: Maximum number of users within a user list
_options.descriptionOfRateLimitFactor: Lower rate limits are less restrictive, higher ones more restrictive.

_condition.createdLessThan: Less than X has passed since account creation
_condition.createdMoreThan: More than X has passed since account creation

_sensitiveMediaDetection.description: Reduces the effort of server moderation through automatically recognizing NSFW media via Machine Learning. This will slightly increase the load on the server.
_sensitiveMediaDetection.sensitivityDescription: Reducing the sensitivity will lead to fewer misdetections (false positives) whereas increasing it will lead to fewer missed detections (false negatives).
_sensitiveMediaDetection.setSensitiveFlagAutomaticallyDescription: The results of the internal detection will be retained even if this option is turned off.
_sensitiveMediaDetection.analyzeVideosDescription: Analyzes videos in addition to images. This will slightly increase the load on the server.

_preferencesBackups.inputName: Please enter a name for this backup
_preferencesBackups.nameAlreadyExists: A backup called "{name}" already exists. Please enter a different name.
_preferencesBackups.applyConfirm: Do you really want to apply the "{name}" backup to this device? Existing settings of this device will be overwritten.
_preferencesBackups.noBackups: No backups exist. You may backup your client settings on this server by using "Create new backup".
